Class AbstractXmlDriver

java.lang.Object
  com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.AbstractXmlDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
HierarchicalStreamDriver
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dom4JDriver, DomDriver, JDomDriver, StaxDriver, XomDriver, XppDomDriver, XppDriver
public abstract class AbstractXmlDriver
extends Object
implements HierarchicalStreamDriver

Base class for HierarchicalStreamDrivers to use xml-based HierarchicalStreamReader and HierarchicalStreamWriter.

Since:
1.2
Author:
Mauro Talevi
